Plot: The Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Sciences celebrates the year's achievements in film.
Title: The Oscars
Writer: Greg Berlanti, Seth Grahame-Smith, Michael Green, Andrew Kreisberg, Neil Patrick Harris (special material written by), Dave Boone (special material written by), Tim Carvell (special material written by), Derek DelGaudio (special material written by), Liz Feldman (special material written by), Paul Greenberg (special material written by), Paula Pell (special material written by), Mason Steinberg (special material written by)
Actors: Neil Patrick Harris, Anna Kendrick, Jack Black, Lupita Nyong'o
Awards: Won 1 Primetime Emmy. Another 1 win & 13 nominations.
